alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Henry; Mercer; Rock Island; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:09PM CDT until May 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Henderson County in west central Illinois... Northern Warren County in west central Illinois... South central Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Mercer County in northwestern Illinois... Southwestern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sunny Hill to Old Gilchrist to Ogle, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Coal Valley, Orion, Sherrard, Lynn Center, Warner, Morristown, Sunny Hill and Sunny Hill Estates around 715 PM CDT. Cable and Osco around 720 PM CDT. Andover, Griffin and Swedona around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cambridge, New Windsor, New Windsor, Henry County Fairgrounds, Alpha, North Henderson, Eleanor, Ophiem, Lake Warren, Ulah, Monmouth, Woodhull, Alexis, Bishop Hill, Gerlaw, Monmouth Municipal Airport and Coldbrook. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Henderson; Henry; Mercer; Rock Island; Warren
